page.title: 19Customs
page.content: In 1642 the council retained a piece of ground for a public market place and fair area. This was the start of the Ferry Fair,held during the second week in August. This depicts the landing of Queen Margaret,after her ship crashed on the rocks at The Binks at the foot of the Loan.With her were her sisters, Princesses Agatha and Christine,and her brother Prince Edgar.The Moubray and Atheling families are featured in the Tableau. The Burry Man's origins are unknown.It is good luck to give him a donation to ward off the evil spirits.He tours the burgh,visiting streets,shops,and industry,with his two helpers,who have covered him in burrs.He is preceded by a bell ringer and children chanting,"Hip,hip,hooray!It's the Burry Man's day!"
